name: Zacurate 500BL Fingertip Pulse Oximeter Blood Oxygen Saturation Monitor with Batteries Included (Navy Blue)
short_description: ACCURATE AND RELIABLE - Accurately determine your SpO2 (blood oxygen saturation levels), pulse rate and pulse strength in 10 seconds and display it conveniently on a large digital LED display.

SPORTS/HEALTH ENTHUSIASTS - For sports enthusiasts like mountain climbers, skiers, bikers, and anyone needing to monitor their SpO2 and pulse rate. The pulse oximeter LED display faces the user for an easy read.

EASY TO USE – Simply insert your finger fully into the chamber, press the power button, and keep your hand still. Movement can affect accuracy. Wait a few seconds for the device to stabilize and display your results.
ACCOMODATES WIDE RANGE OF FINGER SIZES - Finger chamber with SMART Spring System. Works for ages 12 and above.

LOADED WITH ACCESSORIES - Include 2X AAA BATTERIES that will allow you to use the pulse oximeter right out of the box for convenience. Comes with 12 months WARRANTY and USA based technical phone support.

name: ESPOO Pulse Oximeter, Oxygen Monitor Fingertip with 2 AAA Batteries&Lanyard (White&Black)
short_description: Medical-Grade Pulse OX: Utilizes advanced LED optical sensor technology and intelligent algorithms to deliver SpO₂ readings within ±2% accuracy (range: 70%-100%) and pulse rate within ±1 bpm (range: 30-240 bpm), meeting international medical standards
Easy-to-Read 1.3" LED Display – Our oxygen monitor features a clear, bright LED display for easy reading of SpO2, pulse rate, and more, even in low-light settings

Comfortable, Hypoallergenic Silicone Chamber – Featuring a soft, hypoallergenic silicone finger chamber, this oximeter ensures a secure and comfortable fit for a wide range of finger sizes. The latex-free silicone material is gentle on the skin, reducing potential irritation and ensuring accurate readings each time

Simple One-Button Operation – Designed for ease of use, this pulse oximeter features intuitive one-button operation, allowing users of all ages to check their blood oxygen levels and pulse rate in seconds. With just a single press, the device powers on, automatically takes a reading, and displays results on the clear LED screen. This straightforward design eliminates complexity, making it ideal for quick, on-the-go monitoring without any complicated setup

Ideal for Sports & Health Enthusiasts – Perfect for those committed to peak performance and wellness, this pulse oximeter provides fast, accurate readings of blood oxygen levels (SpO2) and pulse rate, supporting you in reaching your fitness goals. Designed for active lifestyles, it features a lightweight, portable build and a soft silicone finger chamber for a comfortable fit during and after workouts. The one-button operation and bright LED display allow for quick, on-the-go monitoring, making it easy to check recovery rates, track progress, or stay informed about vital signs during intense training sessions
Package Include 1 pulse oximeter body+1 lanyard+2 AAA Batteries+1 User Manual

name: O2 Pulse Oximeter Fingertip, Oxygen Saturation Monitor, Bluetooth Pulse Rate Tracking with App, Continuous Rechargeable O2 Finger Oxygen Meter, 4 * 10 Hrs Built-in Memory, Smart Reminder
short_description: Accurate Tracking: Real-time display of blood oxygen saturation, heart rate, and pulse strength with continuous recording; Tracks your SpO2 metrics effortlessly day and night; SpO2 levels accurate to 2% between 80-100% saturation levels

Smart Data Management: Automatically stores 40 hours of measurements locally, 4 sets of 10-hour data; Instantly syncs to ViHealth app via Bluetooth for visual trend charts and unlimited PDF report sharing
Auto-Measurement: Powers on/off automatically with no buttons; Starts tracking vital signs immediately upon finger insertion – no manual operation needed for seamless monitoring

Comfort & Battery: Ultra-soft duckbill sensor comfortably adapts to all finger sizes; Built-in rechargeable battery lasts 14 hours per charge and includes a USB cable, supporting extended wear without discomfort
Custom Alerts & Visibility: APP and device buzzer notify instantly when readings exceed your preset thresholds. Adjust screen brightness across 4 levels for perfect visibility in any lighting
Come with Accessory: Pulse oximeter*1, charging cable*1, carry bag*1, lanyard*1
NOTE: It's not a medical device. This device is for Sports and Aviation use only and not intended for medical use.

name: mibest OLED Finger Pulse Oximeter, O2 Meter, Dual Color White/Black
short_description: 【Accurate and Reliable】Mibest Pulse Oximeter accurately determine your SpO2 (blood oxygen saturation levels) and pulse rate and strength in 4 directions, 6 display modes, and 10 levels of adjustable brightness.
【Plethysmography Waveform】The SpO2 Waveform measures the change in the volume of arterial blood with each pulse beat which helps determine the optimal time to take a reading.

【Compact and Long Battery Life】Oxygen saturation finger monitor is light weight, easy to carry, and accommodates wide range of finger sizes. 40 hours battery life and automatic power off in 8 seconds.

【Out of Box Ready】Our portable oxygen saturation machine comes with Instruction manual, 2 AAA alkaline batteries, Neck lanyard (detachable and adjustable length) you'll be ready to use your portable oxygen sensor right out of the box.

【Sport Enthusiasts】This device is for Sports and Aviation use only and not intended for medical use. It's great for mountain climbers, bikers, trainers, skiers, aviators, and general sport enthusiasts to spot check SpO2 on the fly.

name: Amazon Basic Care Pulse Oximeter (Previously Healthwise)
short_description: ACCURATE READINGS, RELIABLE RESULTS¬–Illuminated red digits clearly show results, and offers a live-reading during use.
COMFORTABLE FIT–Smooth Interior and spring-hinge allows for adult and child size digits without pinching or squeezing fingers.
COMPLETE, MONITORING SYSTEM – Includes convenient quick release lanyard, 2 AAA batteries and illustrated English/Spanish instructions for fast set up and use.
Accurately measures oxygen saturation of arterial hemoglobin and pulse rate
Accommodates a wide range of finger sizes approximately 20-75mm, user weight approximately 33 lbs ~ 242 lbs (15KG ~ 110KG)
No prescription required | Latex-Free
Low battery indicator / Automatic shut-off / Batteries included: 2 AAA
Includes: oximeter unit, 2 AAA batteries, nylon lanyard, and detailed English/Spanish guidebook
product_description: Product Description Pulse oximeters are ideal for sports and fitness enthusiasts to spot-check their blood oxygen saturation and pulse rate on the go as well as reliable for monitoring during air travel. No prescription required. Easy to use and apply-with a simple press of the button, quickly know your blood oxygen saturation (SP02) and pulse rate (BPM)-from any finger. Includes full use instructions, batteries, care and cleaning tips and end user phone call for customer support after purchase. Always read instructions, warnings and use direction prior to use. Intended for adult use only. WARNING: Some studies have indicated that certain physical traits, including, but not limited to darker skin pigmentation, finger thickness, and peripheral perfusion may create variations in readings that make the oxygen level appear higher than it actually is. Users should establish a baseline value when healthy and at rest. It is recommended that users consult a licensed healthcare provider on how to interpret user readings based on physical traits or characteristics. Manufacturer Contact Information Veridian Helathcare, 1175 Lakeside Drive, Gurnee, Illinois 60031 - Customer Care 866-326-1313
